mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (boardno, title, writer, content) VALUES (BOARD_SEQUENCE.NEXTVAL, #{ title }, #{ writer }, #{ content })
INSERT INTO boardattach (attachno, boardno, userfilename, savedfilename) VALUES (BOARDATTACH_SEQUENCE.NEXTVAL, #{ boardNo }, #{ userFileName }, #{ savedFileName })
mapper.select: SELECT boardNo, title, writer, readCount, writeDate, modifyDate, deleted FROM board ORDER BY boardno DESC
SELECT boardno, title, writer, content, readcount, writedate, modifydate FROM board WHERE boardno = #{ boardNo } AND deleted = '0'
